```{r}
library(glmnet)
library(Rcpp)
```


```{r}
body_fat_data <- read.table("https://web.mst.edu/~wenx/teaching/stat5346/data/bodyfat.txt", header=T)
attach(body_fat_data)
```

```{r}
baseline <- lm(Y~X1+X2+X3)
summary(baseline)
```

```{r}
x <- data.matrix(body_fat_data[, c('X1', 'X2', 'X3')])
```


```{r}
lambdas <- 10^seq(2, -3, by = -.1)
ridge_model <- glmnet(x, Y, alpha=0, lambda=lambdas)
print(summary(ridge_model))
ridge_predictions <- predict(ridge_model, newx=x)
plot(Y, ridge_predictions[1:20])
```

For each example, plot
